The course can be started at any time, and working hours are agreed on with your supervisor. You will participate in current research projects, learn how to plan, document and evaluate experiments, and how to write a report about your work.
If you want to take the course, please get in touch with the contact person
(s) named with the specific topic(s) you are interested in.
